en.title: Vue3 component
en.prompt: Create a Vue 3 component that displays a [Project] using Yarn, Vite, Vue 3, TypeScript, Pinia, and Vueuse tools. Use Vue 3's Composition API and <script setup> syntax to combine template, script, and style in a single .vue file. Provide only the necessary code to meet these requirements without explanations or descriptions.
en.remark: Auxiliary development for Vue3. Contributed by @gandli.
